A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Adding a disgusting chapter in the late great Star Wars saga\, The Last Jedi was a blight to behold. The drudginly long and held out film showed the disturbance of a company \"juicing it\" for all its worth. Hidden under a terrible story\, pathetic acting\, slapstick humor\, and leftist-pushing political messages lies the prospects of a decent movie but we just don't get that with this one. Disney once again plays us as sheep.
